item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, April 7, 2025 at 6:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Browser MCP – Automate your browser using Cursor, Claude, VS Code (111 points | 33 comments)
2. Announcing Lux – a luxurious package manager for Lua (10 points | 1 comment)
3. Fifty Years of Open Source Software Supply Chain Security (8 points | discuss)
4. Decoding the 90s: Cryptography in Early Software Development (2023) (68 points | 22 comments)
5. Why Catullus Continues to Seduce Us (36 points | 20 comments)
6. Variable duty cycle square waves with the Web Audio API (19 points | 8 comments)
7. Show HN: Uncurl.dev – Convert curl commands to a shareable, executable UI (45 points | 15 comments)
8. Show HN: Kahuna, the IndexedDB-Manager Webextension (9 points | 2 comments)
9. LLMs understand nullability (116 points | 74 comments)
10. Hasochism: The pleasure and pain of dependently typed Haskell programming [pdf] (2013) (8 points | discuss)
11. The Troll Hole Adventure (3 points | discuss)
12. A startup doesn't need to be a unicorn (418 points | 247 comments)
13. Rsync replaced with openrsync on macOS Sequoia (484 points | 384 comments)
14. Glamorous Toolkit (262 points | 84 comments)
15. We asked camera companies why their RAW formats are all different and confusing (282 points | 148 comments)
16. Global Health Threat: Antibiotic-Resistant "Superbug" Spreading in Malaysia (35 points | 9 comments)
17. Benchmarking LLM social skills with an elimination game (118 points | 33 comments)
18. Interviewing a software engineer who prepared with AI (5 points | 1 comment)
19. The Mathematics of Crochet (68 points | 4 comments)
20. Cursed Excel: "1/2"+1=45660 (114 points | 89 comments)
21. Deterministic simulation testing for async Rust (63 points | 5 comments)
22. Mass Grave of 150 Roman Soldiers Found Under Vienna Sports Field (59 points | 17 comments)
23. The Dire Wolf Is Back (102 points | 108 comments)
24. Knowing where your engineer salary comes from (223 points | 111 comments)
25. I'm manually transcribing the AltairBASIC source, ten lines a day starting today (64 points | 35 comments)
26. A Multiwavelength Look at Proxima Centauri's Flares (42 points | 3 comments)
27. DeepMind program finds diamonds in Minecraft without being taught (188 points | 99 comments)
28. The Untold Mystery Upending Egon Schiele's Legacy (20 points | 8 comments)
29. Charging electric vehicles 5x faster in subfreezing temps (125 points | 103 comments)
30. Watch Antimatter Fall: Scientists Capture Gravity's Pull with a 3840MP Camera (28 points | 12 comments)
